column1: Little Goat Diner////I thought I was hungry
column2: but I was beyond stuffed with just my meal.  Wowza!  My fella ordered this interesting Asian dish that had crunchies and some spicy mayo drizzled over it.  Naturally
column3: I can't find it on the online menu today.  He liked it
column4: and the side of bacon from nearby Publican Quality Meats.  The mimosas were a bit small for the $10 price tag
column5: but I think it comes with the territory.
